name: HyperBees
overview:
HyperBees Ltd. is an Android games publisher working with top indie developers.

Despite its young age, HyperBees has already published some best selling games, like Speedx 3D and Impossible Level Game, which reached top 5 on Android Market, and has a growing portfolio of projects. Games published by HyperBees have been downloaded more than 3.5 million times (early May 2011), with ca. 200,000 daily active players. HyperBees will publish 5-7 new titles by the end of 2011.

HyperBees now focuses on free games with various monetisation platforms. The company provides developers with a range of services, from detailed feedback at all development stages through promotion and social media management.

HyperBees has strong ties with the Android community, including top bloggers and Android-related sites.

Plans for the future: conquer the world, obviously. ;) And publish more kick-ass Android games!
